mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photo (file_name, file_path, upload_date, userinfo_id) VALUES (#{fileName}, #{filePath}, #{uploadDate}, #{userinfoId}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE file_name = VALUES(file_name), file_path = VALUES(file_path), upload_date = VALUES(upload_date)
mapper.select: SELECT id, file_name as fileName, file_path as filePath, upload_date as uploadDate, userInfo_id as userInfoId FROM photo WHERE id = #{id}
